{{Wireless embedded system |brand=PIX-LINK |model=LV-WR09 |revision=1.0 |upc= |ean=122594490797 |asin=B06XD4SN7N |price= |fcc_date= |manuf_country=China |is_manuf= |est_release_date=01/2017 |type=wireless router,range extender |fcc_id= |pwr_v=110-240 |pwr_amp= |pwr_conn=AC (direct) |pwr_vac=true |pwr_ac_hz=50/60 |cpu1_brand=MediaTek |cpu1_model=MT7628KN |cpu1_cspeed=575 |fla1= |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |ram1=8 |ram1_brand=MediaTek |ram1_model=MT7628KN |expansion_if_types= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_chip1_brand=MediaTek |wi1_chip1_model=MT7628KN |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_speed=100M |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips= |flags= |stock_boot= |stock_os= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=Wireless-N |default_ip=192.168.1.254 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui=00:E0:20 |oui_eth=00:E0:20 }} {{TagLine|300Mbps 2.4G Wireless Range Extender}}
PIX-LINK LV-WR09 :Home Mini AC 300Mbps 2.4G Wireless WiFi Router :Signal Range Extender, 4 External Antennas
The Wireless-N Router is a combined wired and wireless network connection device :designed specifically for small business and home office networking requirements. The Wireless-N Router is a high speed solution that is compatible with 802.11b/g/n. :Based on 802.11n technology, It gives users wireless performance at up to 300Mbps, :which can meet your most demanding home networking needs, such as HD streaming, :online gaming and large files downloading.
===Features=== <small> :- Complies with 802.11n to provide a wireless data rate of up to 300Mbps. :- One 10/100M Auto-Negotiation RJ45 WAN port, one 10/100M Auto-Negotiation RJ45 LAN ports. :- Supporting Auto MDI/MDIX, Provides WPA/WPA2, WPA-PSK/WPA2-PSK encryption security. :- Shares data and Internet access for users, supporting Dynamic IP/Static IP/PPPoE/PPTP/L2TP. :- Supports DMZ host, Dynamic DNS, Static Routing. :- Provides Automatic-connection and Scheduled Connection on certain time to the Internet. :- Built-in DHCP server supporting static IP address distributing. :- Built-in firewall supporting IP address, Domain Name, and MAC address filtering. :- Connects Internet on demand and disconnects from the Internet when idle for PPPoE. :- Supports WPS button. :- Supports firmware upgrade and Web management :- Four External Antennas. :- Built-in power adapter, no bulky adapter needed. :- Supports Router, Repeater, WISP, Client and AP mode </small> Latest firmware revision: v28K.MiniRouter.20160820 (as of July 2017)
This router is sold i.e. on AliExpress, eBay as Pix-Link or PIXLink and as well brand-less. <!-- ===See also=== * [http://unknownSupport.com/unknown.html Unknown Support page, please edit link if you know it] * [http://unknownManufacturer.com/unknown.html Unknown Manufacturer page, please edit link if you know it] -->
